message: What can't we use pot money... oh wait that's right we've spent it on more Jails and cop cars....

This is a heartwarming story. I am unsure how many people actually read it. (Some people just react to headlines.) It has been up for over 3 hours and only has 74 comments. That kind of made me sad. By the way, if you only follow Fox you may not have heard about this: Another feel good story about courage and overcoming adversity... and prejudice.

I just watched this interview in full. I dont know what i would do if my child was a victim. However i hope that i would not blame this mom after all the time that has past. She is living a life of personal hell and torment. It makes me think of the Amish and how they reached out to the shooters wife in their time of tragedy. It amazes me how different cultures handle horrible situations. It also makes me furious! Mental health issues are real, they are hurting more people than we want to admit. Yet we ignore that and focus so strongly on gun control. Yes gun control is an issue to address, but if we don't address mental health especially among our children, this will never stop. Let us remember Where there is a will there is a way. These kids that need help will find just that.

Shouldn't have to what?! You said you hoped he didn't talk about his military experience. Please explain to me how much military experience the current president has? Or how much the person you obviously wanted to be president has? NONE, ZERO, ZILCH. And I don't care if she's a woman or not! Her lack of experience because she's a woman doesn't mean a thing.
